languages.text: "Но мы знаем теперь, что таковы и живые души. Они всегда больше, чем кажутся. И их потенциал нельзя рассчитать, какие мощности не привлекай. Это заставляет нас верить, что и мы, Номос, и ты, {name}, можем шагнуть за границы расчетов. И встретиться с тем ужасом, что рвется на волю, и не дрогнуть пред ним".

"But we now know that living souls are the same. They are always larger than they seem. And no capacity can calculate their potential. This makes us believe that we, Nomos, and you, {name}, can step beyond the limit of calculations. There, we will face the unleashing horror without faltering."
languages.original_text: "Но мы знаем теперь, что таковы и живые души. Они всегда больше, чем кажутся. И их потенциал нельзя рассчитать, какие мощности не привлекай. Это заставляет нас верить, что и мы, Номос, и ты, {name}, можем шагнуть за границы расчетов. И встретиться с тем ужасом, что рвется на волю, и не дрогнуть пред ним".

traits.locale_text: "But we now know that living souls are the same. They are always larger than they seem. And no capacity can calculate their potential. This makes us believe that we, Nomos, and you, {name}, can step beyond the limit of calculations. There, we will face the unleashing horror without faltering."

"But we now know that living souls are the same. They are always larger than they seem. And no capacity can calculate their potential. This makes us believe that we, Nomos, and you, {name}, can step beyond the limit of calculations. There, we will face the unleashing horror without faltering."

"But we now know that living souls are the same. They are always larger than they seem. And no capacity can calculate their potential. This makes us believe that we, Nomos, and you, {name}, can step beyond the limit of calculations. There, we will face the unleashing horror without faltering."

"But we now know that living souls are the same. They are always larger than they seem. And no capacity can calculate their potential. This makes us believe that we, Nomos, and you, {name}, can step beyond the limit of calculations. There, we will face the unleashing horror without faltering."

"But we now know that living souls are the same. They are always larger than they seem. And no capacity can calculate their potential. This makes us believe that we, Nomos, and you, {name}, can step beyond the limit of calculations. There, we will face the unleashing horror without faltering."

languages.text: 「しかし今では我々も生きた魂が同じであると知っている。彼らはいつも思った以上に大きい。そして彼らの潜在能力は測れない。だから、我々ノモスとあなた、{name}は計算の限度を超えたところへ行けると信じている。そこで、我々は解放された恐怖にくじけず向かっていくのだ」
languages.original_text: "But we now know that living souls are the same. They are always larger than they seem. And no capacity can calculate their potential. This makes us believe that we, Nomos, and you, {name}, can step beyond the limit of calculations. There, we will face the unleashing horror without faltering."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし今では我々も生きた魂が同じであると知っている。彼らはいつも思った以上に大きい。そして彼らの潜在能力は測れない。だから、我々ノモスとあなた、{name}は計算の限度を超えたところへ行けると信じている。そこで、我々は解放された恐怖にくじけず向かっていくのだ」

languages.text: “但现在我们意识到，所有活着的灵魂都是一样的，总是比看起来要更加强大，没有任何方式可以计算灵魂的潜力。正因如此，我们相信，我们，诺莫斯，和你，{name}，可以超越计算的极限。在那里，我们将毫不犹豫地面对即将爆发的恐怖。”
languages.original_text: "But we now know that living souls are the same. They are always larger than they seem. And no capacity can calculate their potential. This makes us believe that we, Nomos, and you, {name}, can step beyond the limit of calculations. There, we will face the unleashing horror without faltering."

traits.locale_text: “但现在我们意识到，所有活着的灵魂都是一样的，总是比看起来要更加强大，没有任何方式可以计算灵魂的潜力。正因如此，我们相信，我们，诺莫斯，和你，{name}，可以超越计算的极限。在那里，我们将毫不犹豫地面对即将爆发的恐怖。”

languages.text: "Doch wir wissen nun, dass lebende Seelen nicht anders sind. Sie sind immer größer, als sie wirken. Und keine Kapazität kann ihr Potenzial berechnen. Das lässt uns glauben, dass wir, Nomos, und Ihr, {name}, über die Beschränkungen des Berechnens hinausgehen können. Dort werden wir uns dem entfesselten Grauen stellen, ohne zu wanken."
languages.original_text: "But we now know that living souls are the same. They are always larger than they seem. And no capacity can calculate their potential. This makes us believe that we, Nomos, and you, {name}, can step beyond the limit of calculations. There, we will face the unleashing horror without faltering."

traits.locale_text: "Doch wir wissen nun, dass lebende Seelen nicht anders sind. Sie sind immer größer, als sie wirken. Und keine Kapazität kann ihr Potenzial berechnen. Das lässt uns glauben, dass wir, Nomos, und Ihr, {name}, über die Beschränkungen des Berechnens hinausgehen können. Dort werden wir uns dem entfesselten Grauen stellen, ohne zu wanken."

languages.text: « Mais nous savons maintenant que les âmes sont similaires. Elles sont toujours plus grandes qu'en apparence et il est impossible de mesurer leur potentiel. C'est ce qui nous fait croire que vous, {name}, et nous pouvons transcender les limites qui nous sont imposées et qu'ensemble, nous pourrons surmonter cette horreur sans faiblir. »
languages.original_text: "But we now know that living souls are the same. They are always larger than they seem. And no capacity can calculate their potential. This makes us believe that we, Nomos, and you, {name}, can step beyond the limit of calculations. There, we will face the unleashing horror without faltering."

traits.locale_text: « Mais nous savons maintenant que les âmes sont similaires. Elles sont toujours plus grandes qu'en apparence et il est impossible de mesurer leur potentiel. C'est ce qui nous fait croire que vous, {name}, et nous pouvons transcender les limites qui nous sont imposées et qu'ensemble, nous pourrons surmonter cette horreur sans faiblir. »

languages.text: «Pero ahora sabemos que las almas vivas son iguales. Siempre son más grandes de lo que parecen, y ningún procesador es capaz de calcular su potencial. Esto nos mueve a creer que nosotros, Nomos, y usted, {name}, podemos trascender los límites de lo calculable. Y ahí será donde afrontaremos sin flaquear el horror que se avecina».
languages.original_text: "But we now know that living souls are the same. They are always larger than they seem. And no capacity can calculate their potential. This makes us believe that we, Nomos, and you, {name}, can step beyond the limit of calculations. There, we will face the unleashing horror without faltering."

traits.locale_text: «Pero ahora sabemos que las almas vivas son iguales. Siempre son más grandes de lo que parecen, y ningún procesador es capaz de calcular su potencial. Esto nos mueve a creer que nosotros, Nomos, y usted, {name}, podemos trascender los límites de lo calculable. Y ahí será donde afrontaremos sin flaquear el horror que se avecina».

languages.text: "Ancak artık yaşayan ruhların aynı olduğunu biliyoruz. Göründüklerinden çok daha büyükler, potansiyellerini hesaplamak imkânsız. Bu da bizi; biz Nomos'un ve siz {name} efendinin, hesaplamaların sınırının ötesine geçebileceğine inandırıyor. İşte o noktada, serbest kalan dehşetle yılmadan yüzleşeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "But we now know that living souls are the same. They are always larger than they seem. And no capacity can calculate their potential. This makes us believe that we, Nomos, and you, {name}, can step beyond the limit of calculations. There, we will face the unleashing horror without faltering."

traits.locale_text: "Ancak artık yaşayan ruhların aynı olduğunu biliyoruz. Göründüklerinden çok daha büyükler ve potansiyelleri hesaplamak imkânsız. Bu da bizi; biz Nomos'un ve siz {name} efendinin, hesaplamaların sınırının ötesine geçebileceğine inandırıyor. İşte orada, serbest kalan dehşetle yılmadan yüzleşeceğiz."
